affiliation.orgdiv: Dionysos Satellite Observatory, Higher Geodesy Laboratory

section.title: About this document
section.para: This document is a processing summary report. It contains basic information and results obtained via the analysis of a set of given GNSS stations.It is automatically generated by the program V_PROGRAM after a seccesseful run of the processing scheme designed at Dionysos Satellite Observatory, NTUA.
